column1: Smoque BBQ////Great food.  Sometimes Yelp hits one out of the park.  I was visiting some good friends in Chicago and Yelp'd some BBQ places.  Smoque looked good and off we went.  The decor is bad.  Cheap paint on the walls
column3: and so what!  The food is so good I wouldn't care if I had to sit on a cactus.  I travel a lot
column4: and these are my favorite ribs I can remember eating.  BBQ is a very personal thing and I'm sure that if you grew up on a certain kind of BBQ you can always find fault with BBQ that is done different then you are used to.  But don't be a sucka.  This place is great.  Ribs
